Text:
It was under the ‘sampige’ - 
 The fragrant champa tree
 That I waited for Ajji 
 To walk me home. 
 All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently

Lunch was a glorious affair 
 My joyous feet dangling. 
 Eyes hungry, mouth watering. 
 Awaiting Ajji’s spread 
 “Dear netizens, 
 It’s simply 1-2-3  
 100 gm chickpea flour 200 sugar, 300 ghee

And I hope this song can give you a sense of what I feel. 
 It may help you appreciate what life is really like. 
 And remember, 
 Life is a dance

It is all that we have. 
 It is all we have because we are not given. 
 All we have is here.  
 I have this song in my music library

A song I've danced to for so long. 
 I hope to dance
THINK: What did you do today? Step-up or step-away?
